title: Twitch called out for allowing users to create charity campaigns for nonprofits that some consider controversial
description: Twitch has come under fire from some users for including a handful of controversial organizations listed under its Charity Tool.

title: Former Twitter employee sentenced to more than three years in prison for spying for Saudi Arabia
description: A former Twitter employee found guilty of spying on users on behalf of the Saudi royal family has been sentenced to three and a half years in prison.

title: SEC says social media influencers used Twitter and Discord to manipulate stocks

title: Facebook hit with $2 billion lawsuit connected to political violence in Africa
